short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool to automate review requests from the Amazon Seller Dashboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Amazon Bulk Request Reviews
Amazon Bulk Request Reviews is a Chrome extension designed to automate the process of sending bulk review requests for orders in the Amazon Seller Central dashboard. This tool helps Amazon sellers efficiently manage review requests, saving time and improving customer engagement.

With just a click, the extension retrieves recent orders from your Amazon Seller Central account and sends review requests to your buyers, ensuring that you meet Amazonâ€™s guidelines for requesting feedback. The extension is lightweight, easy to use, and does not store or transmit any user data externally.

Why You Should Install It:
Automated Review Requests: Send bulk review requests in one go, without manually selecting each order.
Streamlined Workflow: Integrated directly with Amazon Seller Central, so it fits naturally into your selling process.
Secure: The extension uses your existing Amazon session without storing or sharing any sensitive data.
This extension is an efficient tool for any Amazon seller looking to increase reviews, improve seller ratings, and save time on routine tasks.
